Class javachart.chart.Area 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class javachart.chart.Area 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Area
public class Area
extends Object
This class builds Areas from the specified Datasets for use on specified Axis systems. An Area component uses montonically increasing X values and variable Y values. Each dataset accumulates upon the previous to "stack" the areas.
See Also:
AreaChart, AxisInterface, Dataset

globals

Area(Dataset[], AxisInterface, AxisInterface, Plotarea)
Constructs an Area chart component, consisting of a series of stacked polygons, each polygon representing 1 dataset.

draw(Graphics)
Draws this Area component on the specified Graphics class.
getBaseY(int, int)
returns accumulated value of all previously drawn datasets at this point
getDoClip()
Return the current status of doClip.
getUseDisplayList()
Return the current display list setting.
setDoClip(boolean)
Change the status of doClip.
setUseDisplayList(boolean)
Turn display lists on or off for this chart component.

  protected Globals globals

Area 
  public Area(Dataset d[],
              AxisInterface xAx,
              AxisInterface yAx,
              Plotarea subplot)
Constructs an Area chart component, consisting of a series of stacked polygons, each polygon representing 1 dataset.
Parameters:
d - List of datasets for this component
xAx - This component's x Axis
yAx - This component's y Axis
subplot - The Plotarea under this Area

setDoClip 
  public void setDoClip(boolean onOff)
Change the status of doClip. Default is off: no clipping at plotarea boundaries.
Parameters:
onOff - New status for doClip

Return the current status of doClip.

Draws this Area component on the specified Graphics class.

                                         int whichPoint)
returns accumulated value of all previously drawn datasets at this point
Parameters:
